  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/logicalresult">LogicalResult</a></>}>

</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/failureor">FailureOr&lt;T&gt;</a></>}>
This class provides support for representing a failure result, or a valid value of type <code>T</code>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/failureor/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parseresult">ParseResult</a></>}>
This class represents success/failure for parsing-like operations that find it important to chain together failable operations with <code>||</code>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parseresult/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class represents an efficient way to signal success or failure. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// should be preferred over the use of &#96;bool&#96; when appropriate, as it avoids</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// all of the ambiguity that arises in interpreting a boolean result. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// class is marked as NODISCARD to ensure that the result is processed. Users</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// may explicitly discard a result by using &#96;(void)&#96;, e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;(void)functionThatReturnsALogicalResult();&#96;. Given the intended nature of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this class, it generally shouldn&#39;t be used as the result of functions that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// very frequently have the result ignored. This class is intended to be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in conjunction with the utility functions below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/logicalresult"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; LogicalResult &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If isSuccess is true a &#96;success&#96; result is generated, otherwise a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#39;failure&#39; result is generated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/logicalresult/#ac3732ee5a111ea78dec325ea8c561fa8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LogicalResult <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/logicalresult/#ac3732ee5a111ea78dec325ea8c561fa8">success</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSuccess = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/failureor/#afb060effaf644cd64f306e2873ad7cbd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">operator</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/logicalresult">LogicalResult</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aea6e51b13067f27d5b9bd39d1f44b670">success</a>(has&#95;value()); &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Hide the bool conversion as it easily creates confusion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&gt;::operator bool;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Wrap a value on the success path in a FailureOr of the same value type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> = std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;!std::is&#95;convertible&#95;v&lt;T, bool&gt;&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae2fa50a7ec05cbf26bd9d5bb8abd5b22"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6ea6fb3a4e8248113053829b7fd89c96a260ca9dd8a4577fc00b7bd5810298076">success</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/failureor">FailureOr&lt;std::decay&#95;t&lt;T&gt;</a>&gt;(std::forward&lt;T&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class represents success/failure for parsing-like operations that find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it important to chain together failable operations with &#96;||&#96;.  This is an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extended version of &#96;LogicalResult&#96; that allows for explicit conversion to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// bool.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class should not be used for general error handling cases - we prefer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to keep the logic explicit with the &#96;succeeded&#96;/&#96;failed&#96; predicates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// However, traditional monadic-style parsing logic can sometimes get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// swallowed up in boilerplate without this, so we provide this for narrow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cases where it is important.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parseresult"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parseresult/#a1c8e93421614220a28c4c685de257b15">ParseResult</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LogicalResult &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parseresult/#a1c8e93421614220a28c4c685de257b15"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parseresult/#a1c8e93421614220a28c4c685de257b15">ParseResult</a>(LogicalResult Result = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/logicalresult/#ac3732ee5a111ea78dec325ea8c561fa8">success</a>()) : LogicalResult(Result) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Failure is true in a boolean context.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/parseresult/#a08d8feb4584f75764e82340ac35ac9a5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">explicit</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">operator</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> bool()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/logicalresult/#ab2850b11db804ad8b3f8fdc05c692619">failed</a>(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
